Package ride.path

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    PathStrategy
    This interface contains methods to calculate the best pickup station and return station.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AvoidPlusStrategy
    This PathStrategy avoids PlusStations.
    DistanceBasicComparator
    This class is used to compare stations according to their distance to a point.
    DistanceEndComparator
    This class is used to compare stations according to their distance to a point and to their free slots.
    DistanceStartComparator
    This class is used to compare stations according to their distance to a point and to the bikes that are available in them.
    FastestPathComparator
    This class is used to compare stations according to the time spent to go from start to the Station by foot and from the Station to returnPoint by bicycle.
    FastestPathStrategy
    This PathStrategy minimizes the ride time.
    MinimalWalkingStrategy
    This class is an implementation of the PathStrategy interface and finds the pickup station and return station which minimize the walking distance of the user.
    PreferPlusStrategy
    This PathStrategy prefers a PlusStation if it is less than 10% further than the closest station.
    StationComparator
    This class contains some methods that are useful for the comparators.
    UniformityStrategy
    This path strategy prefers a pickup station with more bikes available (depending on the type specified) and that is less than 5% further than the closest to the start point.
